https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/diJx8NUTPoFOHwbhXEeHOsjVxLL.jpg In Carlos Saura’s exquisite Cría cuervos…, Ana Torrent portrays the disturbed eight-year-old Ana, living in Madrid with her two sisters and mourning the death of her mother, whom she conjures as a ghost (an ethereal Geraldine Chaplin).
